dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3845782J] Use of a State Farm Trademark
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 17, 2007 9:29 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3845782J] Use of a State Farm Trademark ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Use of a State Farm Trademark Added by system at Tuesday, Apr 17 2007 10:04 am X-MailFrom: home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Apr 17 10:04:31 2007 Received: (qmail 4330 invoked by alias); 17 Apr 2007 15:04:31 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 4327 invoked from network); 17 Apr 2007 15:04:31 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 17 Apr 2007 15:04:31 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 17 Apr 2007 10:04:31 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 17 Apr 2007 10:04:31 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HdpEN-00035g-0i for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 17 Apr 2007 10:04:31 -0500 Received: from ns21.statefarm.com ([12.34.246.40]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HdpEB-000LBB-0N for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 17 Apr 2007 10:04:19 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Return-Receipt-To: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C78101.AA0C1A04" Subject: Use of a State Farm Trademark Date: Tue, 17 Apr 2007 08:04:15 -0700 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Use of a State Farm Trademark Thread-Index: AceBAant3pOJcJOETtWRmj0F4wz6Hg== From: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" To: Cc: "HOME LAW-INTERNETCD" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 17 Apr 2007 15:04:15.0597 (UTC) FILETIME=[AA5499D0:01C78101] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY One State Farm Plaza Bloomington, Illinois 61710-0001 Theplanet.com Internet Services, Inc. abuse@theplanet.com Re: Use of a State Farm Trademark Dear Sir/Madam: Please find attached a copy of the March 14, 2007, email that I sent to you. To date, we have not received a response from you. We consider the use of our trademark to be a serious matter. Please respond by the close of business on May 7, 2007. Thank you. Sincerely, Debra J. Monke, ACP Intellectual Property Administrator home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com DJM/rje _____________________________________________________________ STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY One State Farm Plaza Bloomington, Illinois 61710-0001 Theplanet.com Internet Services, Inc. abuse@theplanet.com RE: Use of a State Farm Trademark Dear Sir/Madam: This is to notify you that Anant Reddy mailto:A_chittamuru@hotmail.comis infringing our trademark "State Farm" within the metatags of the website "www.autoinsurancesupport.com/terms.html/." Our research reflects that Theplanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is the ISP for this website. The metatags of the website uses our U.S. federally registered trademark "State Farm." This trademark was registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office on June 11, 1996. The owner is State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company. The mark has been in use in interstate commerce since 1930. This is also the year of our first use. This mark is used for insurance services, see Registration No. 1,979,585. This individual is not authorized to use our trademark "State Farm." Further, cease and desist emails were sent to the email address of the registrant contact on 11/07/06, 12/22/06, and 01/30/07; however, no responses have been received. As of this date, our trademark is still being used in the metatags of this website. Pursuant to clauses in your Acceptable Usage Policy under Intellectual Property Infringement Policy: Users may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others or violates any trade secret right of any other person.... If any Customer or any Third Party User, including those that are customers of our Customers, repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy, any copyright law or any other intellectual property right, The Planet reserves the right to (i) suspend permanently or terminate The Planet Services of such Customer and/or (ii) suspend permanently or terminate the access to The Planet Services, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure by such Third Party User. Please initiate an investigation and have our trademark removed from the metatags of this site, or have the site terminated. I would appreciate hearing from you as to what action will be taken by the close of business on April 3, 2007. Sincerely, Debra J. Monke, ACP Intellectual Property Administrator home.law-internetcd.681e00@statefarm.com DJM/rje MIME element (text/html) Use of a State Farm Trademark

STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY
